title: MLB.TV Header displays
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the headers being displayed

title: Image displays for the main banner
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the banner

title: Media Center title is "MLB streams Live Games Schedule"
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games
custom_expected: THEN the “MLB Streams: Live Game Schedule” is displayed

title: Previous click date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on the previous date on the date picker
custom_expected:
THEN the URL updates with expected date
AND content is different from what is was before

title: Next click date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on the next date on the date picker
custom_expected:
THEN the URL updates with expected date
AND content is different from what it was before

title: Pick date from calendar view
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on the date button
AND chooses a different date from the drop down calendar
custom_expected:
THEN the URL updates with expected date
AND content is different from what it was before

title: Click list view
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-game
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks the list view option
custom_expected: THEN the games are displayed in a list layout

title: Click card grid view
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on the card grid view option
custom_expected: THEN the games are displayed in a card grid layout

title: Header1 displays "All time Eastern. Subject to Change"
custom_preconds: Given a user is on https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games
custom_expected:
Then the header 1 displays “All times Eastern. Subject to Change.” on the default URL (no date)
Note: It is controlled by Adobe Test & Target

title: Header2 displays "MLB.TV subscribers can enjoy an expanded library of premium content, including documentaries, classic programs and World Series films."
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games
AND the header 2 “MLB.TV subscribers can enjoy an expanded library of premium content, including documentaries, classic programs and World Series films.”
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on this link
custom_expected: THEN the page will open https://www.mlb.com/tv/featured/

title: Live games are available in list view
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games
AND a live game is available 
AND the list view option is selected
custom_expected:
THEN the “MLB.TV Live Games” title is displayed
AND the “Choose Your Favorite Team’s Broadcast” is displayed
AND Live games are displayed in a table
Headers: 
	Time & Location
	Game
	MLB.TV
	MLB Audio
AND Favorite Game of the Day is displayed above time

title: Live games are available in card grid view
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games
AND a live game is available
AND the card grid view option is selected
custom_expected:
THEN the “MLB.TV Live Games” title is displayed
AND live games are displayed in cards
AND card title: {HOME} vs. {AWAY} with logos are displayed
AND “Free Game of the Day” text displays for free games
AND start time and stadium displays. Example: 2:05 PM ET @ Globe Life Field
AND links for MLB.TV video feeds are available
AND links for MLB.TV audio feeds are available

title: Upcoming games are available in list view
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on  https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games
AND the list view option is selected
custom_expected:
THEN the “MLB.TV Upcoming Games” title is displayed
AND “Free Game of the Day” text displays for free games and are highlighted in yellow
AND upcoming games are displayed in a table
Headers: 
	Time & Location
	Game
	MLB.TV
	MLB Audio

title: Upcoming games are available in car grid view
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games
AND the card grid view option is selected
custom_expected:
THEN the “MLB.TV Upcoming Games” title is displayed
AND upcoming games are displayed in cards 
AND card title: {HOME} vs. {AWAY} is shown with logos
AND “Free Games of theDay” text displays for free games and are highlighted in yellow
AND start time and stadium displays. Example: 2:05 PM ET @ Globe Life Field
AND links for MLB.TV video feeds are available 
AND links for MLB.TV audio feeds are available

title: Postponed games are available in list view
Postponed games are available in card grid view
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games
AND the card grid view option is selected

title: Blackout footer below main page content
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games
custom_expected: THEN the blackout footer should display and function

title: MLB footer below blackout footer
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games
custom_expected: THEN the MLB footer is displayed
